last_task_title: Complete documentation updates: integrate CLAUDE_NEW_FEATURES.md into CLAUDE.md, update architecture docs, and update README
last_task_description:
Based on DOCUMENTATION_UPDATE_SUMMARY.md (2025-11-08):

## Tasks Overview

1. **CLAUDE.md Integration** (⏳ Partial - only date updated)
   - Replace 'Project Structure' section with updated hierarchy from CLAUDE_NEW_FEATURES.md
   - Add '🔥 NEW FEATURES' section after Project Structure
   - Copy interceptor documentation (lines 1-150 of CLAUDE_NEW_FEATURES.md)
   - Copy context retrieval documentation
   - Update 'Known Issues / TODOs' section with interceptor crash warning
   - Update 'Recent Updates' section with 2025-11-08 entry

2. **Architecture Documentation** (docs/architecture/OVERVIEW.md)
   - Add interceptor component to architecture diagram
   - Document 3-tier architecture: Client → Interceptor → Memory Proxy → LiteLLM
   - Add context retrieval integration flow diagram
   - Update component descriptions
   - Add new sections for both features

3. **README.md Updates** (⏳ Needs Update)
   - Add mention of new interceptor feature
   - Add mention of context retrieval feature  
   - Link to src/interceptor/README.md
   - Add ⚠️ known issues warning (interceptor crashes with supermemory endpoints)

## Reference Files
- DOCUMENTATION_UPDATE_SUMMARY.md (lines 249-273: actionable recommendations)
- CLAUDE_NEW_FEATURES.md (complete source content for integration)
- src/interceptor/README.md (400+ lines, already complete)
- docs/guides/CONFIGURATION.md (context_retrieval section already complete)

## Critical Known Issue to Document
⚠️ Interceptors crash when used with supermemory-proxied endpoints
- Affects: api_base: https://api.supermemory.ai/v3/api.anthropic.com
- Workarounds: Use direct provider endpoints OR skip interceptor
- Status: Under investigation (tracked in src/interceptor/README.md)

## Success Criteria
- [ ] CLAUDE.md has complete project structure section
- [ ] CLAUDE.md has NEW FEATURES section with both features documented
- [ ] CLAUDE.md mentions known interceptor issue
- [ ] docs/architecture/OVERVIEW.md includes interceptor architecture
- [ ] docs/architecture/OVERVIEW.md includes context retrieval flow
- [ ] README.md mentions both new features
- [ ] All cross-references verified working
- [ ] Documentation consistent across all files
